segments.text: My eyes keep drifting back to the young boy attempting his cookie heist.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He is standing on that small, two-step stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: But the stoolâ€™s legs are splayed out, and it's leaning dramatically.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It looks incredibly unstable, almost ready to pitch backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: His body is stretched upward, every muscle tense as he reaches for the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: One hand is inside, but the other holds a plate that might not help his balance.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him falling from that height is genuinely alarming.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could easily injure himself, or break the jar and the plate.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The girl waiting below seems oblivious to the immediate danger.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It makes me incredibly anxious just watching his precarious position.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I really hope he manages to get his cookies without a mishap.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole scenario is a recipe for an accident.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I find myself holding my breath.
segments.speaker: PAR
